author: SoMee.social
title: Integrate SoMee.social onto Cardano
description: Cardano is seeking Social DApps that will grow it's user base at scale and offer features like DeFi , NFTs, monetization, and data control.

assessments.note: I fail to see what real problem this Dapp will resolve in the world. It comes across as a open source facebook with  emphasis on consumer culture and impulsive purchasing of stuff.  It will increase utility & adoption of end products by the eyballs their marketing strategy will reach but I'm not convinved that this app is in alignment with overal Cardano community commitments and will bring worthwhile visibility to the protocol itself.
assessments.reply: This CA says they "fail to see what real problem this DAPP will resolve...", but then goes on to say that "it will increase utility and adoption...", which is what SoMee plans to help with for Cardano. As for the "alignement" with Cardano SoMee will utilize the meta data feature of Cardano to put users in control of their data and provide options to allow individuals the choice of "when, IF, HOW" they want to share and monetize data, which IS IN ALIGNMENT with Cardano ethics.

assessments.note: There is not a clear plan on what is being developed.
assessments.reply: This CA clearly did not read our proposal items 1-4 lay out a clear plan and we posted a link to a detailed 5 year plan https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MEM7nm0Zcfme-ScLzSHxjoutJ27fElTp6C9-q0Gyuio/edit

assessments.note:
Many people voting are non-technical and jargon-averse. The proposal for technical integration is great but the lay question will be 'so what!'
what would sell this is for you to back up your headline that millions of users will be brought to Cardano.  How? When? Do you already have them & once the integration is built they appear or is the funding also to be used to promote Somee?
Also some sort of simple architecture would be useful so people can contextualise how Cardano fits in to the Somee ecosystem, the Bitboy video speaks about Ethereum, Waves, Steem....
This proposer fill one of the objective of having decentralize system in the social media space, where it's monopolized by a few.

Expertise on this team are mainly anchored in the advertising world and experienced with maximising profits and revenues through mass promotion of consumer goods. This is a large budget for investigative work and unclear how the rest of it will be generated.

requested total funds 75000, do not equal 150,000 - 300,000 requested in the accompanying text. An incoherent budget is unlikely to lead to a successful project.
Also please provide evidence of experience and how you are bringing on  Mr. Allen Kay to the project.
assessments.reply: We were told to reduce the amount requested as to increase our chance of Fund5 funding to share with other proposers.  We still stand by the detailed budget that we've laid out, but can start with the first phase and participate in future funds if needed.

assessments.note:
Technical experience and drive of proposers to deliver is evident.
What would be useful to see is how dependent you are on IOG for the success of this proposal

Although the amount asked is higher than most in the DApps Fund, the proposer had agreed to break up the amount to multiple phases and has provided a thorough analysis that will bring feasibility to the project. See here => https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MEM7nm0Zcfme-ScLzSHxjoutJ27fElTp6C9-q0Gyuio/edit#gid=406588375

There is no timeline for this project or any breakdown of Cardano component costs or what experience with integration proposer is bringing to the project. Killer app definition is very specific to different app cultures and would suggest proposer comes back after they recruit a Cardano developer onto their team and declare their relationship to the community beyond being 'massive holders of ADA and long time supporters of Cardano'.
assessments.reply: We provide a detailed breakdown items 1-4 and list the current active site that was already built https://SoMee.social and https://Beta.SoMee.social that shows you the EXTENSIVE work already done to build a state of the art DAPP.

assessments.note: Pleas provide a detailed budget and milestones. This doesn't seem like a concrete proposal. It releis on new hires which the requested funds won't support and a marketing from someone you have not provided evidence you can pay for or is otherwise associated with the project.
assessments.reply: We have built out an entire platform at SoMee.social and the newest version we plan to integrate onto Cardano at https://Beta.SoMee.Social  - detailed budget listed in 1-4 with integration timeline (initial) for June and July 2021.  Of course we would use existing resources but also hire new resources to accelerate the integration.

assessments.note:
This proposal would benefit from a simple timeline (plan on a page) showing key milestones and deliverables.
The finances can then be aligned to these milestones/deliverables. At the moment it is not clear what is being requested $150k or $75k. If $75k then how will the money be spent bits of points 1-4 and some marketing ??
A simple tidy-up in how this proposal is presented will make a huge difference.

The information provided as well as the level of transparency and engagement from SoMee is a good starting point, as can be viewed here, where it lists project plan, margins, staffing cost, income projects, etc. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MEM7nm0Zcfme-ScLzSHxjoutJ27fElTp6C9-q0Gyuio/edit#gid=406588375

solution: SoMee.social combines a powerful social DeFi, NFT enabled, monetized platform that will attract millions of new users to Cardano at scale.
experience:
SoMee is live at SoMee.social and Beta.SoMee.Social. Bitboy: https://youtu.be/LLHc4SUfHoM  
Crow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tf1YENqydJ8
